entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crash when allocating 4+ MB with high LOH threshold #95219
  • Authentication - An extended error has occurred. #95214
  • TimeZoneInfo.StandardName empty when run under ubuntu-latest NET 8, while value present with NET 6 #95213
  • Mono Windows x86: possible CompareExchange issue causes failures in System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource.Tests #95210
    9.0.0
  • Path information aren't appended when custom message is provided to `JsonException` #95205
    Future
  • Wrong nuget package versions for Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Tasks and Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Analyzers? #95204
  • Calling interface method of value type cause boxing #95202
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'i < BitSetTraits::GetSize(env)' during profile synthesis #95199
  • Missing Git tags for several 4.x releases #95198
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization throwing exception culture identifier not found when creating culture #95195
  • `InlineArray` size validation does not handle all cases #95193
  • [wasm] Changing DllImport does not result in a new wasm module #95192
  • .Net 7 + 8 Garbage Collection Regression Issue #95191
  • vsdbg quits when resuming from a breakpoint if stepping over a line that throws an exception #95189

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: BigEndian/Network integer types #95207
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, runtime, .NET 6 RC 2, validation-runtime-.NET 6 RC 2 #runtime-109158-.NET6RC2 #59241
    6.0.x
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, .NET 6, validation-runtime-.NET 6, runtime #runtime-101520-.NET6 #57259
    6.0.x
  • ILLink: argument out of range when formatting MSBuild message for a warning #93804
  • ILLink: ArgumentException in Cecil metadata reader during marking #94457
  • [debugger] `SteppingTests` fail on CI with `Command timed out, and was killed` #91801
  • [mono] System.IO.Pipes.Tests test fails on `linux_bionic-x64 Release AllSubsets_Mono` #87279
  • Error: The type initializer for 'Microsoft.DotNet.XHarness.TestRunners.Common.ApplicationOptions' threw an exception. #90040
  • [mono] Tests failing with `Failed to find compatible device: arm64-v8a` #87267
  • Mono Bionic Android arm64 CI failure - Failed to get device's property SupportedArchitectures / Device unauthorized / $ADB_VENDOR_KEYS is not set #75022
  • [API Proposal]: Fluent API for System.Text.Json #95196
  • [API Proposal]: Allow segmented raw writes for Utf8JsonWriter.WriteBase64StringValue #95186
  • [API Proposal]: ReadOnlySequence<byte> handling by System.Text.Json source generator #95187
  • Write JSON asynchronously to stream with System.Text.Json #95194
  • Stackoverflow exception in `NetworkStream.DataAvailable` after migration do .NET 6 #95114
  • HttpClient: How to disable hostcert verification when using SocketsHttpHandler ? #95190

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95218
    area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95217
    area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95216
    area-System.Security
  • Bump dependencies of markdownlint action #95215
    area-Infrastructure
  • [NativeAOT] Remove dependency of RuntimeType.GUID on universal custom attribute reader #95212
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable MetricEventSourceTest on Mono on Windows x86 #95211
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • [PERF] Enable division optimization for s390x #95201
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Skip EH table for inlinees in fgDfsReversePostorder #95200
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [main] Fix incremental servicing condition #95197
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95157
    area-System.Security

Updated

  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_AA_3A to IF_SVE_HL_3A #95127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [RISC-V] Add crossgen2 for riscv64 #95188
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Implement some of the NYI methods in unwindriscv64 #95128
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Expose TLS details for QUIC connection #93014
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Count16BitElements() intrinsic for SVE #94845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Introduce fgDebugCheckTypes #94621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][MacOS] Run tests on iOS 17 and MacOS 14 scouting queues #88479
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Assert bbJumpKind in BasicBlock::HasJump #95152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] js string marshaling by value #95180
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] JSImport binding improvements #95177
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Flush-to-zero behavior for float-to-int conversion #94762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Issues

Updated

PullRequests

    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator does not add VersionInformation to generated XmlSerializers.dll file #36964
  • dotnet ef cannot find sdk on Ubuntu 23.04 #36380
  • [NET 8.0 - RC2] Warning: Failed to read or parse localization file "C:\Program Files\.....\microsoft.dotnet.web.projecttemplates.8.0.8.0.0-rc.2.23480.2.nupkg ......... #36000

Updated

  • PackageInstall.Tests timeout known build error #36192
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • 7.O RTM Error #28373
  • dotnet watch on net6.0 project results in FileNotFoundException for SystemRuntime #28942
  • dotnet gloabl tool can not be start after uprade to dotnet sdk 8.0 on Ubuntu(WSL) #37017
  • dotnet pack fails when `GeneratePackageOnBuild` is `true` #10335
    Discussion
  • global.json is ignored if cwd is out of project or solution directory #28399
  • dotnet tool package cache bug #28695

PullRequests

Created

  • [HotReload] Skips Browser refresh middleware when running against an unsupported target framework version #37139

Updated

  • [Blazor] Replace `webapp,razor` with `blazor` on `dotnet new` #36657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2322571 #36923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • False positive in Nullability analysis within OR conditional #70962
  • Dynamic compound assignment doesn't take receiver by reference #70956

Closed

  • Explicit interface declaration implementation on nullable types, it FAILS!!! #70958

PullRequests

Created

  • Log solution state on test failure #70961
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to vs-extension-testing 0.1.184-beta #70960
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not try to share syntax trees in languages that don't have them #70955
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Avoid timeout during cleanup after previous timeout #70959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Emit `readonly.` for constrained array access #70949
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Create a Razor language server cohosted in Roslyn #70819
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: mvc #52358
  • Interactive component looses state on Navigate to same page #52356
  • [Blazor] Better diagnostics for running on WebAssembly. #52354
  • dotnet 7.0 and dotnet 8.0 are incompatible (host part) #52352
  • Implement JavaScript click event functions for easy use in Blazor #52349
  • [Blazor] Hot Reload not working properly when applying rendermode InteractiveServer to razor page in .NET 8.0.100 #52348
  • .NET 8.0 Blazor Web App EditForm loses values #52347
  • My project whichi is working correctlly in visualstudio2022 v17.6 does not work after updating vs to v17.8 #52346
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot #52345
  • The JSON returned by SignalR does not contain the $type field #52342

Closed

  • RenderMode not working with razor class libraries #52129
  • Perf regression: plaintext, plainTextWithFilter #52344
  • IHttpClientFactory.GetClient(string name) to access a mutated HttpClient instance #52334
  • Static files can't be served from the root when a Razor page component matches that route with param #52320
  • Blazor Api call in OnInitializedAsync() with auth and UserMiddleware crash #52350
  • OnInitialized and OnInitializedAsync are called twice with @rendermode InteractiveServer #52208
  • [Feature] Async version of `IWebHostBuilder.ConfigureServices` #51035
  • Upgrading Blazor Server app to .Net 8 throws error 'The output byte buffer is too small...' #52186
  • RDG generated code error When FromRoute|FromQuery etc with `Name` arg #52343
  • blazor will auto add tag in img or css but with it added in JS it will not? #38709
    Planning: WebUI
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef #52318
  • [Blazor .NET8] In interactive Auto, services created in clients cannot be found if injected in components. #52341
  • NotifyPropertyChanged + Blazor Server UI Thread #52217

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix enhanced form handling use defalt enctype, honor enctype and formenctype #52359
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Try to load the assembly when finding out a root component or a parameter in webassembly #52351
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x

Merged

  • [Blazor] Try to load the assembly when finding out a root component or a parameter in webassembly #52331
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [Blazor] Update MSBuild targets so they get imported correctly (6.0). #52260
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android API 34 app startup crash #19023
  • BindableObject.SetValueCore null reference crash #19021
  • BindingExpression.Apply null reference crash #19020
  • App size is too large in Release mode with several native binded libraries #19019
  • The MAUI team does not respond to issues with any urgency... THIS IS **THE** ISSUE!!! #19018
  • ScrollView does not scroll when is inside a StackLayout #19017
  • [tests] The windows Frame device tests fail with : No installed components were detected. #19015
  • Scrollview not scrolling with open keyboard when content fits in screen #19014
  • BlazorWebView does not initialize properly on Android platform #19013
  • [iOS] Building the MAUI base app raise warnings with RuntimeIdentifier=ios-arm64 #19012
  • [iOS] Layout issue (regression, worked correct in MAUI 7) #19011
  • WebView in android forget user login credentials every app restart #19010
  • GraphcView: Draw method of Drawable constantly fires #19009
  • Publish iOS App via cmd - Asset Validation failed #19008
  • Visibility Issues: Incomplete Label Display on macOS and IOS When Padding is Applied #19007
  • Navigation to modal page #19006
  • Scrollview scrolling not works after updating .NET 8 in MAC and iOS platforms #19005
  • [Windows]Clicking on Snackbar should not open a new instance of the application #19003
  • [MAUI] VS exits debug mode after changing Android Emulator Settings while playing an animation #19002
  • [MAUI] Enabling Remove Animations won't make Label 2 of the F2 page visible #19001
  • [MAUI] Enabling Battery Saver won't make both labels (Label 1, Label 2) of the F1 page fully visible immediately #19000
  • Button HeightRequest value not applying lesser than default value #18999
  • FilePicker.PickMultipleAsync Does not work on Xiaomi phones, still can only select one, not multiple #18998
  • Navigation page back button does not work on iOS12 #18997

Closed

  • Platform View Null on a Custom Control #18847
  • [MacCatalyst]RadioButton does not display button #14485
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate Binding #19004
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨

Updated

  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Blazor] Fix static file handling so that it special cases modules.json (main) #18953
  • [Testing] Add Layout UITests #18923
    area/layout 🔲, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Catalyst] Allow setting of MaximumTrackColor on Slider when using Mac Idiom #18990
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • [Android] Fix RefreshView loading indicator position #17647
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Bump the androidx group with 16 updates #18943
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18942
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #18941
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18970
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Join on OpenJson primitive collections #32407
  • Table splitting: Support mapping to the same table/column as another entity/entity's property. #32406
  • dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold runs successfully but does not create any models or update existing models #32405
  • Compex types inconsistencies?: Record struct vs record for Requrired and ComplexType attribute, how to deal with Default values? #32404
  • Error " nu1202: package dotnet-ef 8.0.0 is not compatible with net7.0 (.netcoreapp,version=v7.0)" pop up when use command "dotnet tool install --global dotnet-ef" to install dotnet ef tools in Dev 17.7.7 or lower version #32403
  • Update on foreign key relation on a read only scenario #32402

Closed

  • EF8 SQL: "Incorrect syntax near the keyword 'WITH'." when joining tables with list.Contains in Where #32400

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
